params.title: Database ID
params.description: The ID of the database to connect to

params.title: Collection Name
params.description: The name of the collection to search in

params.title: Quick Preview Schema
params.description:
This field lets you format response data for easy reading. Define key-path pairs in JSON, where the key is the header and the value is the data path.
Example: `{ "Name": "result.user.name", "Email": "result.contact.email" }`

params.title: Value
params.description: Object fields values in JSON format. Ex. `{"a":"b","c":[1,2,3]}`

params.title: Replace whole object
params.description: If this flag enabled whole object value will be replaced, otherwise only specified fields will be updated

params.title: Quick Preview Schema
params.description:
This field lets you format response data for easy reading. Define key-path pairs in JSON, where the key is the header and the value is the data path.
Example: `{ "Name": "result.user.name", "Email": "result.contact.email" }`

nodes.title: Put first name into system message
